meanings.definition: Able to be moved to a different location.
meanings.sent1: The relocatable chair can easily be shifted to the other room.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in relocatable office furniture for flexibility.
meanings.sent3: The relocatable desk decided it wanted a change of scenery.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like relocatable clouds, drifting from one place to another.
meanings.sent5: The relocatable tent fluttered in the wind, ready for a new adventure.

meanings.sent1: The relocatable boxes were stacked neatly for the move.
meanings.sent2: The relocatable house was transported to a different neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The relocatable cat seemed to enjoy exploring new places.
meanings.sent4: His heart felt like a relocatable piece, always searching for a new home.
meanings.sent5: The relocatable sign pointed the way to the temporary location.

meanings.definition: Suitable for moving to a new place.
meanings.sent1: The relocatable plants thrived in various environments.
meanings.sent2: The relocatable technology made it easy to adapt to different settings.
meanings.sent3: The relocatable toy car went on a journey around the house.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as relocatable as a traveler seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The relocatable backpack held all her essentials for the trip.
